trust_service_categories.name: Common Criteria (Security)
trust_service_categories.description: Controls related to the security of the system

criteria.name: COSO Principle 1
criteria.description: The entity demonstrates a commitment to integrity and ethical values.
points_of_focus: Sets the tone at the top
Evaluates adherence to standards of conduct

criteria.name: COSO Principle 2
criteria.description: The board of directors demonstrates independence from management and exercises oversight.

criteria.name: COSO Principle 13
criteria.description: The entity obtains or generates and uses relevant, quality information.
points_of_focus: Captures internal and external sources of data

criteria.name: COSO Principle 14
criteria.description: The entity internally communicates information necessary to support objectives.
points_of_focus: Communicates with the board of directors

criteria.name: COSO Principle 15
criteria.description: The entity communicates with external parties.

criteria.name: COSO Principle 6
criteria.description: The entity specifies objectives with sufficient clarity to enable identification and assessment of risks.

criteria.name: COSO Principle 7
criteria.description: The entity identifies risks to the achievement of its objectives and analyzes risks.
points_of_focus: Includes entity, subsidiary, division, operating unit levels

criteria.name: COSO Principle 8
criteria.description: The entity considers the potential for fraud in assessing risks.

criteria.name: COSO Principle 9
criteria.description: The entity identifies and assesses changes that could significantly impact internal control.

criteria.name: COSO Principle 16
criteria.description: The entity selects, develops, and performs ongoing evaluations.
points_of_focus: Considers a mix of ongoing and separate evaluations

criteria.name: COSO Principle 17
criteria.description: The entity evaluates and communicates internal control deficiencies.

criteria.name: COSO Principle 10
criteria.description: The entity selects and develops control activities.

criteria.name: COSO Principle 11
criteria.description: The entity selects and develops general controls over technology.
points_of_focus: Determines dependency between use of technology and general controls

criteria.name: COSO Principle 12
criteria.description: The entity deploys control activities through policies and procedures.

criteria.name: Logical and Physical Access Controls
criteria.description: The entity implements logical access security software and processes.
points_of_focus: Identifies and manages infrastructure and software

criteria.name: Prior to Registration and Authorization
criteria.description: Prior to registration, the entity registers authorized users and grants access.
points_of_focus: Removes access that is no longer required

criteria.name: Access Security Removal
criteria.description: The entity removes access to protected information assets when appropriate.

criteria.name: Logical Access Measures
criteria.description: The entity implements logical access security measures.

criteria.name: Transmission and Movement
criteria.description: The entity restricts the transmission and movement of data.

criteria.name: Malicious Software Prevention
criteria.description: The entity implements controls to prevent or detect malicious software.

criteria.name: Detection and Monitoring
criteria.description: The entity uses detection and monitoring procedures.

criteria.name: Security Monitoring
criteria.description: The entity monitors system components for anomalies.

criteria.name: Security Evaluation
criteria.description: The entity evaluates security events to determine whether they could impact objectives.

criteria.name: Incident Response
criteria.description: The entity responds to identified security incidents.

criteria.name: Incident Recovery
criteria.description: The entity identifies, develops, and implements activities to recover from incidents.

criteria.name: Change Management
criteria.description: The entity authorizes, designs, develops, configures, tests, and implements changes.

criteria.name: Risk Mitigation Through Controls
criteria.description: The entity identifies, selects, and develops risk mitigation activities.

criteria.name: Risk Assessment and Management
criteria.description: The entity assesses and manages risks associated with vendors and business partners.

criteria.name: Availability Commitment
criteria.description: The entity maintains availability commitments and performance standards.

criteria.name: Environmental Protections
criteria.description: The entity authorizes, designs, develops, and implements environmental protections.

criteria.name: Recovery Procedures
criteria.description: The entity tests recovery procedures supporting system recovery.

criteria.name: Confidential Information Identification
criteria.description: The entity identifies and maintains confidential information.

criteria.name: Confidentiality Disposal
criteria.description: The entity disposes of confidential information to meet objectives.

criteria.name: Processing Integrity Definitions
criteria.description: The entity obtains or generates, uses, and communicates relevant information.

criteria.name: Processing Inputs
criteria.description: System inputs are complete, accurate, and recorded in a timely manner.

criteria.name: Processing Activities
criteria.description: System processes are complete, accurate, timely, and authorized.

criteria.name: Processing Outputs
criteria.description: System outputs are complete, accurate, and distributed appropriately.

criteria.name: Processing Errors
criteria.description: The entity implements procedures to identify processing errors.

criteria.name: Privacy Notice
criteria.description: The entity provides notice to data subjects about its privacy practices.

criteria.name: Privacy Choices and Consent
criteria.description: The entity communicates choices and obtains consent.

criteria.name: Privacy Collection
criteria.description: Personal information is collected consistent with objectives.

criteria.name: Privacy Use and Retention
criteria.description: Personal information is limited to intended purposes.

criteria.name: Privacy Access
criteria.description: The entity grants data subjects access to their personal information.

criteria.name: Privacy Disclosure and Notification
criteria.description: Personal information is disclosed to third parties only as described.

criteria.name: Privacy Quality
criteria.description: The entity collects and maintains accurate personal information.

criteria.name: Privacy Monitoring and Enforcement
criteria.description: The entity monitors compliance with privacy commitments.
